comments: The interface said: Render the whole report document..., but the implementation of this interface(RenderTask) doesn't do anything.
Seems to be missing a major feature. Since page range is supported, whole report should be supportable without too much trouble.

The render() API failed my test in Standalone env, when I run my engine unit test -- org.eclipse.birt.report.tests.engine.compatibility.reportdoc.CompatibilityTest that use the render() API, the following exception is throwed:
